languages.text: "В юдоли своей да обрету я понимание путей Его, желаний Его и воли Его".
"May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."
languages.original_text: "В юдоли своей да обрету я понимание путей Его, желаний Его и воли Его".

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to find comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to find comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Que la providencia me depare comprender Sus caminos, Sus deseos y Su voluntad».
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: «Que la providencia me depare comprender Sus caminos, Sus deseos y Su voluntad».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “愿我的命运能引领我，理解祂的道路、祂的愿望以及祂的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: “愿我的命运能引领我，理解祂的道路、祂的愿望以及祂的旨意。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Puisse-t-Il m'honorer de la compréhension de Ses voies, de Ses vœux et de Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse-t-Il m'honorer de la compréhension de Ses voies, de Ses vœux et de Sa volonté. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「主の道、主の願い、主の意志を理解することが、私の宿命であらんことを」
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: 「主の道、主の願い、主の意志を理解することが、私の宿命であらんことを」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Möge es meine Bestimmung sein, seine Wege, seine Wünsche und seinen Willen verstehen zu lernen."
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: "Möge es meine Bestimmung sein, seine Wege, seine Wünsche und seinen Willen verstehen zu lernen."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "O'nun yollarını, dileklerini ve isteklerini kavrayabilmek benim kaderim olsun."
languages.original_text: "May it be my destined lot to attain comprehension of His ways, His wishes, and His will."

traits.locale_text: "O'nun yollarını, dileklerini ve isteklerini kavrayabilmek benim kaderim olsun."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion
